thread.section_title: The Z Hotel Piccadilly - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient hotel in central London
thread.title_full: Convenient hotel in central London - Review of The Z Hotel Piccadilly, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mike M
title: Convenient hotel in central London
text: The rooms are extremely small with bed and shower enclosure. They are clean, modern with a good size television. But, make no mistake, the rooms are basic with no frills! However, staff are friendly and efficient with the hotel situated in a very convenient, central location. Complimentary wine and cheese each evening between 5 - 8.00pm was first rate. We will certainly be returning on our next visit to London.
